hero.title: About me
hero.subtitle: I'm Liam Viader, a designer and developer who balances the technical with the creative. Based near Barcelona, I build AI-powered products, games, and systems that turn ideas into real experiences.

profile.title: Who I am
profile.subtitle: A technical and creative profile
paragraphs: I graduated in Game Design and Development at UdG. I enjoy operating where software engineering, system design, and interactive storytelling meet.
My focus is on building AI-driven products, agents and creative tools, video games, and platforms that blend exploration with solid technical execution.

thinking.title: How I think
thinking.subtitle: From idea to system
thinking.intro: I work as if I were switching between two hemispheres: I connect concepts, turn them into tangible systems, and refine them through iteration.

ai.title: AI and intelligent systems
ai.description: I design agents and flows that combine reasoning, data, and UX so that AI delivers real value.

games.title: Games and interaction
games.description: I craft expressive mechanics and experiences where interaction matters as much as the technology.

systems.title: Design and iteration
systems.description: I map ideas, prototype quickly, and adjust with metrics, feedback, and creative sensitivity.

stack.title: Stack and tools I use
stack.subtitle: A living stack across AI, web, and games
stack.intro: I combine AI tooling, web ecosystems, and game engines to move fluidly between prototype and product.

education.title: Education
education.subtitle: Game Design and Development (UdG)
education.intro: Graduated with a holistic view across design, programming, and production of interactive experiences.
education.detail: The degree let me dive deep into system design, applied AI for gameplay, and multidisciplinary team coordination.

experience.title: Applied experience
experience.subtitle: Real projects with impact
paragraphs: During my internship with the EXIT research group I developed an energy community simulator, combining real datasets with AI models to assess collaborative scenarios.
It was a chance to collaborate with real stakeholders and prove that my ideas work beyond personal projects. More details in Projects.

personal.title: Off-screen
personal.subtitle: What recharges me
personal.intro: I balance intense creative work with habits that bring me back to my body and to nature.
items: Nature and mountains to disconnect, walk, and breathe.
A healthy fixation with the sky: sunsets, clouds, and the night sky.
Learning saxophone and piano—the music forces me to listen differently.
Regular sports to keep my energy and focus.
Any creative activity that involves having ideas and making them real.

philosophy.title: How I work
philosophy.subtitle: Explore, iterate, and build
paragraphs: I'm a creative person with plenty of ideas, always looking for ways to turn them into systems that can stand on their own.
I love collaborating with people who want to experiment, iterate quickly, and push technology to craft meaningful experiences.

cta.title: Ready to build something together?
cta.description: If you're looking to collaborate or need someone thinking in AI, games, or interactive systems, I'd love to talk.
